overview:
Paramdeep is a co-founder and managing director of Saavn. In his role as managing director, he leads the charge on forming strategic partnerships, drives business development, and creates strategies for distribution and revenue generation. Under Paramdeepâ€™s leadership, the company has been able to acquire the best of South Asian entertainment and has secured partnerships with the top film production and music houses in India. Through his efforts, Saavn has amassed the largest legitimate Bollywood music catalog available directly to end users online.

Paramdeep is a serial entrepreneur with experience in numerous ventures across verticals including real estate, retail, IT services, and international media and trade. He graduated from the College of Arts & Sciences at Tufts University with degrees in International Relations, Economics and Entrepreneurship.
